content: * please note this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free version on my blog www theturtletrunk com * the cloud nine beanie is the perfect crochet hat for winter it uses super bulky yarn making it super warm and cozy this beanie features big texture using easy crochet stitches the pattern includes 8 sizes uses less than 1 skein of yarn and it works up quickly includes 8 sizes 0-3months 3-6 months 6-12 months 1-3 years 3-10 years teen/adult small adult medium adult large difficulty advanced beginner / easy standard us crochet terms pattern includes - detailed written instructions for 8 sizes - gauge pattern - link to the free video tutorial supplies needed super bulky 6 weight yarn 50-90 yards 9 00mm m/n hook yarn needle and scissors
